Text:
For Windows 7 users you may encounter a bug with the in game menu settings not staying in low resolution. Reinstallation will not solve it. You must go into the registry entry and modify the key to "zero" instead of " 1" .

located here:

computer\Hkeycurrentuser\software\popcap\zumasrevenge\

modify d-word "HiRes" from "1" to "0"
it was a fine download works with xp duh but (and i knew this) it didnt work on 98! quelle suprise
Only downloaded Zuma's Revenge, and can verify it works great, so far anyway. Thanks!
